# Digital Security & OSINT Tools Reference Guide
**ॐ माता काली** 🗡️ *Comprehensive tooling framework for dharmic protection work*

---

## 1. SPECIALIZED OSINT SECURITY TOOLS

### Professional OSINT Platforms

#### **Maltego**
- **Website**: https://www.maltego.com/
- **Pricing**: https://www.maltego.com/pricing/
- **Pricing Range**: €999 - €40,000/year (Community edition free)
- **Features**: 
  - Visual investigation platform with 300+ data integrations
  - Entity recognition (people, companies, websites, social accounts)
  - Graph analysis for relationship mapping
  - Enterprise collaboration tools
- **Use Cases**: Complex relationship mapping, corporate investigations
- **Documentation**: https://docs.maltego.com/
- **Training**: https://www.maltego.com/transform-hub/

#### **Shodan**
- **Website**: https://www.shodan.io/
- **Pricing**: https://account.shodan.io/billing
- **Pricing Range**: $59 - $899/month (Free tier available)
- **API Documentation**: https://developer.shodan.io/
- **Features**:
  - Internet-connected device scanning
  - Real-time infrastructure monitoring
  - Vulnerability detection
  - Historical data tracking
- **Python Library**: https://github.com/achillean/shodan-python
- **CLI Tools**: https://cli.shodan.io/

#### **Recorded Future**
- **Website**: https://www.recordedfuture.com/
- **Contact**: Enterprise pricing only - https://www.recordedfuture.com/request-demo/
- **Features**:
  - Threat intelligence platform
  - Dark web monitoring
  - Brand protection
  - Predictive threat analysis
- **API Documentation**: https://api.recordedfuture.com/
- **Intelligence Cloud**: https://app.recordedfuture.com/

### Specialized Digital Footprint Tools

#### **Pipl (LexisNexis Risk Solutions)**
- **Website**: https://pipl.com/
- **Now**: https://risk.lexisnexis.com/products/pipl
- **Contact**: Enterprise solutions only
- **Features**: 
  - Global people search engine
  - Social media identity resolution
  - Professional network discovery
- **API**: https://docs.pipl.com/

#### **Spokeo**
- **Website**: https://www.spokeo.com/
- **Pricing**: https://www.spokeo.com/premium
- **Pricing Range**: $13.95 - $26.95/month
- **Features**: Public records, social media scanning, reverse lookups
- **Business Plans**: https://www.spokeo.com/business

#### **BeenVerified**
- **Website**: https://www.beenverified.com/
- **Pricing**: https://www.beenverified.com/faq/how-much-does-beenverified-cost/
- **Pricing Range**: $26.89 - $35.12/month
- **API**: https://www.beenverified.com/lp/api/

#### **Social Catfish**
- **Website**: https://socialcatfish.com/
- **Pricing**: https://socialcatfish.com/pricing/
- **Pricing Range**: $5.73 - $27.48/month
- **Features**: Reverse image search, social media investigation, dating profile verification
- **Business Solutions**: https://socialcatfish.com/business/

### Free/Open Source OSINT Tools

#### **theHarvester**
- **GitHub**: https://github.com/laramies/theHarvester
- **Documentation**: https://github.com/laramies/theHarvester/wiki
- **Features**: Email, subdomain, virtual host discovery

#### **Recon-ng**
- **GitHub**: https://github.com/lanmaster53/recon-ng
- **Documentation**: https://github.com/lanmaster53/recon-ng/wiki
- **Features**: Modular reconnaissance framework

#### **SpiderFoot**
- **Website**: https://www.spiderfoot.net/
- **GitHub**: https://github.com/smicallef/spiderfoot
- **Features**: Automated OSINT collection and analysis

#### **Sherlock**
- **GitHub**: https://github.com/sherlock-project/sherlock
- **Features**: Username search across 400+ social networks

---

## 2. PROFESSIONAL REPUTATION MANAGEMENT

#### **BrandYourself**
- **Website**: https://brandyourself.com/
- **Pricing**: https://brandyourself.com/pricing/
- **Pricing Range**: $99 - $799/month
- **Features**: 
  - Search result monitoring and optimization
  - Content creation tools
  - Negative content suppression
- **Business Solutions**: https://brandyourself.com/business/

#### **NetReputation**
- **Website**: https://netreputation.com/
- **Contact**: Custom pricing ($3,000-$15,000 typical)
- **Phone**: 1-800-357-4349
- **Features**:
  - Full-service reputation management
  - Legal takedown services (DMCA)
  - Crisis management protocols

#### **Reputation.com**
- **Website**: https://www.reputation.com/
- **Contact**: Enterprise pricing - https://www.reputation.com/request-demo/
- **Features**: Enterprise reputation management, review management
- **Platform**: https://platform.reputation.com/

#### **ReputationDefender (Norton)**
- **Website**: https://www.reputationdefender.com/
- **Pricing**: Starting at $15/month
- **Features**: Personal reputation monitoring, privacy protection
- **Contact**: 1-855-877-2665

---

## 3. CUSTOM AI SOLUTIONS

### Open Source LLM Self-Hosting

#### **Ollama** (Easiest Deployment)
- **Website**: https://ollama.ai/
- **GitHub**: https://github.com/ollama/ollama
- **Installation**: https://ollama.ai/download
- **Models**: https://ollama.ai/library
- **API Documentation**: https://github.com/ollama/ollama/blob/main/docs/api.md

```bash
# Installation
curl -fsSL https://ollama.ai/install.sh | sh

# Run models
ollama run llama2:70b
ollama run mistral:7b
ollama run codellama:13b
```

#### **Text Generation WebUI (oobabooga)**
- **GitHub**: https://github.com/oobabooga/text-generation-webui
- **Documentation**: https://github.com/oobabooga/text-generation-webui/wiki
- **Installation Guide**: https://github.com/oobabooga/text-generation-webui#installation
- **Model Support**: https://github.com/oobabooga/text-generation-webui#supported-model-backends

#### **LlamaFile (Mozilla)**
- **GitHub**: https://github.com/Mozilla-Ocho/llamafile
- **Documentation**: https://github.com/Mozilla-Ocho/llamafile#readme
- **Features**: Single-file LLM deployment, cross-platform

#### **LM Studio**
- **Website**: https://lmstudio.ai/
- **Features**: GUI-based local LLM management
- **Downloads**: https://lmstudio.ai/
- **Model Repository**: Built-in Hugging Face integration

### Commercial AI APIs with Flexibility

#### **OpenAI API**
- **Website**: https://openai.com/api/
- **Pricing**: https://openai.com/pricing
- **Documentation**: https://platform.openai.com/docs
- **API Reference**: https://platform.openai.com/docs/api-reference
- **Function Calling**: https://platform.openai.com/docs/guides/function-calling
- **Fine-tuning**: https://platform.openai.com/docs/guides/fine-tuning

#### **Anthropic Claude API**
- **Website**: https://www.anthropic.com/api
- **Console**: https://console.anthropic.com/
- **Documentation**: https://docs.anthropic.com/
- **Pricing**: https://www.anthropic.com/pricing
- **Tool Use**: https://docs.anthropic.com/claude/docs/tool-use

#### **Mistral AI**
- **Website**: https://mistral.ai/
- **Platform**: https://console.mistral.ai/
- **Documentation**: https://docs.mistral.ai/
- **API Reference**: https://docs.mistral.ai/api/
- **Models**: https://docs.mistral.ai/getting-started/models/
- **Pricing**: https://mistral.ai/technology/#pricing

#### **Google AI Studio (Gemini)**
- **Website**: https://makersuite.google.com/
- **Documentation**: https://ai.google.dev/docs
- **API**: https://ai.google.dev/api
- **Pricing**: https://ai.google.dev/pricing

### Model Repositories

#### **Hugging Face**
- **Website**: https://huggingface.co/
- **Models**: https://huggingface.co/models
- **Security Models**: https://huggingface.co/models?pipeline_tag=text-classification&search=security
- **Transformers Library**: https://github.com/huggingface/transformers
- **Datasets**: https://huggingface.co/datasets

#### **Civitai** (Specialized Models)
- **Website**: https://civitai.com/
- **NSFW Content Warning**: Contains adult content
- **Features**: Community-driven model sharing

### Cloud Deployment Options

#### **AWS Solutions**
- **SageMaker**: https://aws.amazon.com/sagemaker/
- **EC2 GPU Instances**: https://aws.amazon.com/ec2/instance-types/
- **Bedrock (Managed AI)**: https://aws.amazon.com/bedrock/

- **Vertex AI**: https://cloud.google.com/vertex-ai

- **AI Platform**: https://cloud.google.com/ai-platform

- **Cognitive Services**: https://azure.microsoft.com/en-us/products/ai-services/cognitive-services

- **Pricing**: https://www.runpod.io/pricing

## 7. COST ANALYSIS FRAMEWORK

### **Minimum Viable Setup ($2,000-$5,000)**
- Shodan Professional: $300/year
- Local LLM server (RTX 4090 build): ~$3,000
- Basic reputation monitoring: $500/year
- VPN services: $100/year

### **Professional Grade ($15,000-$30,000 annually)**
- Maltego Enterprise: $15,000/year
- Dedicated AI server (RTX 6000): $8,000
- Commercial API credits: $2,000/month ($24,000/year)
- Professional reputation management: $5,000/year
- Compliance consulting: $10,000/year

### **Enterprise Level ($50,000+ annually)**
- Full OSINT platform suite: $40,000+/year
- Custom AI model development: $100,000+
- Legal compliance framework: $25,000/year
- 24/7 monitoring capabilities: $50,000/year

---

## 8. IMPLEMENTATION ROADMAP

### **Phase 1: Foundation (Weeks 1-2)**
1. Set up basic OSINT tools (Shodan, free tools)
2. Deploy local LLM (Ollama + Llama 2)
3. Establish secure communication channels
4. Create basic workflows and documentation

### **Phase 2: Professional Tools (Weeks 3-6)**
1. Acquire Maltego or equivalent professional platform
2. Set up cloud infrastructure for scaling
3. Integrate AI processing pipelines
4. Develop client reporting templates

### **Phase 3: Business Operations (Weeks 7-12)**
1. Create client onboarding processes
2. Establish legal compliance procedures
3. Build quality assurance protocols
4. Launch pilot projects with selected clients

---

### OSINT Training
- **OSINT Curious**: https://osintcurio.us/
- **The OSINT Newsletter**: https://sector035.nl/

### Security Certifications
- **CISSP**: https://www.isc2.org/Certifications/CISSP
- **CEH**: https://www.eccouncil.org/programs/certified-ethical-hacker-ceh/
- **OSCP**: https://www.offensive-security.com/pwk-oscp/

### AI/ML Education

- **Hugging Face Course**: https://huggingface.co/learn/nlp-course/
